com.qoppa.pdf.annotations

Interface WidgetSignature

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Annotation, Widget

    public interface WidgetSignature
extends Widget
    Interface to a signature field Widget annotation. These annotations are used to display signature fields in a document.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software
